thread.title: Will come back for sure
thread.title_full: Will come back for sure - Review of Park Plaza Victoria London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Ginny F
title: Will come back for sure
text: We stayed at the park plaza for two night the room was fine staff friendly breakfast very nice. We had to ask for a hair dryer for the room the first morning there was no hot water so we were given complementary breakfast. All in all it was fine great location for Victoria station. We enjoyed are stay.
